tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE orders ( 
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    cocktail_id INT, 
    customer_id INT, 
    order_date DATE, 
    order_quantity INT, 
    total_price DECIMAL (10, 2) 
);
CREATE TABLE cocktails (cocktail_id INT PRIMARY KEY, cocktail_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, cocktail_id INT, quantity INT NOT NULL, order_date DATE NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE revenue (revenue_id INT PRIMARY KEY, order_id INT, total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE Orders (
  order_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  cocktail_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  order_date DATE
);
